resources.string:
Since March 2019, Google prohibited the access to the call log to all call recording apps. In order to identify a caller number, please, enable Call Recorder ACR App Connector in your device's Accessibility Settings.

In case a caller's number wasn't identified, you can set it manually via the recording's context menu.

App Connector is also required to record cellular calls on Android 10 devices.

NOTE: App Connector requires Accessibility Services permission.
Enable Call Recorder ACR App Connector

Navigation gestures can interfere with this
app.If you use them,you will still be able to
use this app if you select "Left" or "Right" below.
Select an edge to open the notification shade from:

ACCESSIBILITY SERVICE
Required for the app to run

DRAW OVERLAYS
For the quick settings panel to
be dissplayed

SHOW NOTIFICATIONS
To show notifications in the
notification panel
Permission can also be set later on
Select a style for the panel background

Drag and drop tiles to reposition them in the
Active area.
Tap tiles to add/remote them.
Touch and hold a tile in the Inactive area to
delete it.
3rd party tiles are supported but are limited due
to Android restrictions.

Select a method to toggle secure settings
such as mobile data
